rows.label: tev016102_MSG0001
rows.name:
Our project to build a large-scale water-purification
plant here on Mira is finally underway![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016102_MSG0002
rows.name:
As team leader, I had intended to manage the project
myself...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016102_MSG0003
rows.name:
But I've decided to put Ajoa in charge, as it was her
efforts more than anyone's that led us to this point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016102_MSG0004
rows.name:
I know she's had her share of difficulties with the
project, but I'm confident that if there are solutions
to be found, she'll find them.[ST:wait ]
